statements: SELECT * FROM access_controls WHERE access_level = 'admin';
SELECT id, username FROM access_controls WHERE username = 'JohnDoe';
SELECT password, access_level FROM access_controls WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, username, access_level FROM access_controls WHERE access_level = 'user';
SELECT * FROM access_controls WHERE id > 3;
SELECT * FROM access_controls WHERE access_level = 'admin' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, username FROM access_controls WHERE password = 'password123' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM access_controls WHERE username LIKE '%user%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, access_level FROM access_controls WHERE access_level IN ('user', 'admin') ORDER BY access_level DESC, id ASC;
SELECT id, username, password, access_level FROM access_controls WHERE username != 'admin' ORDER BY access_level ASC, id DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, role FROM users WHERE id = 2;
SELECT * FROM access_logs WHERE log_id = 100;
SELECT user_id, access_time FROM access_logs ORDER BY access_time DESC;
SELECT username, accessed_table FROM users, access_logs WHERE users.id = access_logs.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT username, role FROM users WHERE id > 5 ORDER BY role ASC;
SELECT u.username, a.accessed_table, a.access_time FROM users u INNER JOIN access_logs a ON u.id = a.user_id WHERE u.username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM access_logs WHERE access_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-02-01 00:00:00' ORDER BY access_time DESC;
SELECT u.username, COUNT(a.log_id) AS total_access FROM users u LEFT JOIN access_logs a ON u.id = a.user_id GROUP BY u.username HAVING total_access > 5 ORDER BY total_access DESC;
SELECT * FROM access_controls WHERE id = 1;
SELECT user_id, data FROM access_controls;
SELECT username FROM users WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM permissions WHERE access_level = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, username, access_level FROM users JOIN permissions ON users.user_id = permissions.user_id;
SELECT data, user_id FROM access_controls WHERE id = 1
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE user_id = 2
SELECT access_level, user_id FROM permissions WHERE permission_id = 3
SELECT data, user_id FROM access_controls WHERE id = 2 ORDER BY user_id ASC
SELECT access_level, user_id FROM permissions ORDER BY access_level DESC
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT role_name FROM roles WHERE role_id = 2;
SELECT data_table, data_column FROM access_controls ORDER BY access_id DESC;
SELECT users.username, roles.role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id;
SELECT id, username, email FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT role_name FROM roles ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.id = user_roles.user_id WHERE user_roles.role_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM access_controls WHERE data_table = 'customers';

SELECT users.username, roles.role_name, access_controls.data_table FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id JOIN access_controls ON user_roles.user_id = access_controls.user_role_id;
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT username, password FROM Users ORDER BY user_id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM UserRoles WHERE role_id = 1;
SELECT role_name FROM Roles WHERE role_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT permission_name FROM Permissions WHERE permission_name LIKE '%read%';
SELECT Users.username, Roles.role_name FROM Users JOIN UserRoles ON Users.user_id = UserRoles.user_id JOIN Roles ON UserRoles.role_id = Roles.role_id
SELECT Users.username, Roles.role_name FROM Users JOIN UserRoles ON Users.user_id = UserRoles.user_id JOIN Roles ON UserRoles.role_id = Roles.role_id WHERE Users.username = 'Alice'

SELECT Users.username, Roles.role_name, Permissions.permission_name FROM Users JOIN UserRoles ON Users.user_id = UserRoles.user_id JOIN Roles ON UserRoles.role_id = Roles.role_id JOIN RolePermissions ON Roles.role_id = RolePermissions.role_id JOIN Permissions ON RolePermissions.permission_id = Permissions.permission_id
SELECT Users.username, Roles.role_name FROM Users JOIN UserRoles ON Users.user_id = UserRoles.user_id JOIN Roles ON UserRoles.role_id = Roles.role_id ORDER BY Roles.role_name DESC

SELECT Users.username, Roles.role_name FROM Users JOIN UserRoles ON Users.user_id = UserRoles.user_id JOIN Roles ON UserRoles.role_id = Roles.role_id WHERE Users.username LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY Users.username ASC
